contentHtml:
Write a programme to find the square of a number

Input  : 5
Output : 25

# input
n=int(input('Input: '))

# output
print('Output: ',n**2)

import java.util.*;

public class Square {
    public static void main(String[] args) {
        // scanner class to take input
        Scanner sc = new Scanner(System.in);

        // input number
        System.out.print("Input  : ");
        int n = sc.nextInt();

        // squaring n
        int squareOfn = n * n;

        // printing output
        System.out.println("Output : " + squareOfn);
    }
}

frontMatter.title: Square of a number
frontMatter.description: Write a program to find the square of a number
